messages.subject: Re: Nurturing children
messages.msgSnippet: ... now.  Is this it?  Kids Are Worth It: Giving Your Child the Gift of Inner Discipline by Barbara Coloroso Mary Ellen Snowflakes are on of nature s most
messages.messageBody:
>>>there's a book by Barbara Colorosa....I can't think of the name just
now. >>>
Is this it? Kids Are Worth It: Giving Your Child the Gift of Inner
Discipline by Barbara Coloroso

Mary Ellen
Snowflakes are on of nature's most fragile things,
but just look at what they can do
when they stick together.
